hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export DOCKER_HOST=https://cloud.atlas:2376 export CURL_CA_BUNDLE= export DOCKER_TLS_VERIFY=1 export DOCKER_CERT_PATH=/opt/jenkins_config/.docker export TAG=$GIT_COMMIT
echo "

===== Stop and remove db & web containers =====

"
docker-compose stop ackris-db ackris-web docker-compose rm -f ackris-db ackris-web
echo "

===== Start db & web containers =====

" docker-compose up -d ackris-db ackris-web

export DOCKER_HOST=https://cloud.atlas:2376 export CURL_CA_BUNDLE= export DOCKER_TLS_VERIFY=1 export DOCKER_CERT_PATH=/opt/jenkins_config/.docker export REDIS_PORT=6380 export TAG=$GIT_COMMIT
echo "

===== Stop and remove db & web containers =====

"
docker-compose stop ackris-db ackris-web docker-compose rm -f ackris-db-snapshot ackris-web-snapshot
export DOCKER_URL=https://cloud.atlas:2376 echo "
==== PUSH IMAGE blue.sky/ackris-web:GIT_COMMIT ====
" curl -k --config /opt/jenkins_config/.curlr -X POST -H "X-Registry-Auth: empty" \ ${DOCKER_URL}/images/blue.sky/ackris-web/push?tag=$GIT_COMMIT
echo "
==== TAG IMAGE to blue.sky/ackris-web:latest ====
" curl -k --config /opt/jenkins_config/.curlrc -X POST -H "X-Registry-Auth: empty" \ ${DOCKER_URL}/images/blue.sky/ackris-web:$GIT_COMMIT/tag?repo=blue.sky/ackris-web\&force=0\&tag=latest
echo "
==== PUSH IMAGE blue.sky/ackris-web:latest ====
" curl -k --config /opt/jenkins_config/.curlrc -X POST -H "X-Registry-Auth: empty" \ ${DOCKER_URL}/images/blue.sky/ackris-web/push?tag=latest
echo "
==== REMOVE IMAGE blue.sky/ackris-web:GIT_REVISION ====
" curl -k --config /opt/jenkins_config/.curlrc -X DELETE -H "X-Registry-Auth: empty" \ ${DOCKER_URL}/images/blue.sky/ackris-web:$GIT_COMMIT?force=1
echo "
==== REMOVE IMAGE blue.sky/ackris-web:latest ====
" curl -k --config /opt/jenkins_config/.curlrc -X DELETE -H "X-Registry-Auth: empty" \ ${DOCKER_URL}/images/blue.sky/ackris-web:latest?force=1
